root.Summary: 1: Dorr C, Wu B, Guan W, Muthusamy A, Sanghavi K, Schladt DP, Maltzman JS,Scherer SE, Brott MJ, Matas AJ, Jacobson PA, Oetting WS, Israni AK.Differentially expressed gene transcripts using RNA sequencing from the blood of immunosuppressed kidney allograft recipients.
